name: University of Trinidad & Tobago: The Aviation Campus
about: The University of Trinidad and Tobago's Aviation Campus is a premier institution for aviation education, focusing on aircraft maintenance and support services, ground handling, and airport ancillary operations. Our programs, including the BSc. in Aeronautical and Airworthiness Engineering and the Bachelor of Science in Aircraft Maintenance and Management, are designed to meet international standards such as BCAR Section L and EASA/JAR 66 Syllabi. Students gain hands-on experience with modern workshops and live aircraft activity on our in-house Boeing 727-200F and Sikorsky S76A++ aircraft. Our curriculum combines engineering courses with regulatory technical content, preparing graduates for roles in engineering design, repair, and continued airworthiness. We equip students with the knowledge and skills sought after by aviation companies worldwide, ensuring a robust and global career path.
services: ["Certificate in Aviation Technology\nBachelor of Science in Aeronautical and Airworthiness Engineering\nBachelor of Science in Aircraft Maintenance and Management"]
